name: Castaway:A Spark of Hope
description:
You've been stranded on an island with limited resources,  you managed to start a fire, but now you have to keep it alive. And keep yourself alive

Use W,A,S,D to move,

Move into trees to Break them

Move into the fire to feed it

Step on Pineapples to eat them

Art by: Dustin Bogers (Twitter)

Music by: MegaHammer Studios (Website, Twitter, Instagram)

Game Design by: Olivier Proulx (Instagram)
